com.solidfire.client

Class HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity

  • Object
    • HttpsRequestDispatcher
      • HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestDispatcher, Versionable

    public class HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity
extends HttpsRequestDispatcher
    A request dispatcher that completely disables security checking.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity(URL endpoint)
      Create a dispatcher using no authentication.
      HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity(URL endpoint, String username, String password)
      Create a dispatcher using HTTP basic authentication using the supplied username and password.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void prepareConnection(HttpsURLConnection connection)
      Constructs a security disabled HTTPS POST connection,

        decodeResponse, dispatchRequest, getVersion

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity

        public HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity(URL endpoint)
        Create a dispatcher using no authentication.

      • HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity

        public HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity(URL endpoint,
                                     String username,
                                     String password)
        Create a dispatcher using HTTP basic authentication using the supplied username and password.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the hostname or IP address of the connection
        username - username credential
        password - password credential
